title: A Girl and Her Cow
description: Wilhelmina has always wanted to raise a hucow, it's been a fetish long denied. When she discovers Diana's Dairy, a hucow dairy and training facility, she discovers a place where she can explore her unspoken desires. Finding her Angel, her very own hucow to care for satisfies a longing in her soul.Angelina has been a mistreated hucow. Can Wilhelmina earn her trust? Perhaps her love?
author: Rubey Noire
